pr_title: SAK-44376 Changed the messaging and the default size of Samigo's File Upload question type

timeline.message: SAK-44376 Changed the messaging and the default size of Samigo's upload question type

timeline.bodyText: If these strings aren't translated in their respective languages, you can just remove them from the files. It will fall back to the default language anyway. Having these keys in the other language files may make it seem like they're already translated, and then they won't ever get translated.
timeline.author: bjones86
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -520,7 +520,7 @@ random_draw_msg_no_date=The questions for this part are generated randomly from
 random_update_questions=Update Questions
 
 # for upload questions in editAssessment.jsp
-upload_instruction=Click "Browse" to locate your file and then click "Upload" to upload your file.
+upload_instruction=Choose a file to upload.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            upload_instruction=Click "Browse" to locate your file and then click "Upload" to upload your file.
          
          
            
            upload_instruction=Choose a file to upload.
timeline.author: bjones86
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -520,7 +520,7 @@ random_draw_msg_no_date=The questions for this part are generated randomly from
 random_update_questions=Update Questions
 
 # for upload questions in editAssessment.jsp
-upload_instruction=Click "Browse" to locate your file and then click "Upload" to upload your file.
+upload_instruction=Choose a file to upload.

replies.bodyText: GitHub says "Applying suggestions on deleted lines is not supported."
